kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Kvzlz zovbsk il ahrlu dpao mha-jvuahpupun mvvk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua; bzl dpao jhbapvu vusf pm ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl–zlypvbz spcly puqbyf ylwvyalk).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hsalyuhal kvzl iladllu 1 huk 2 ahislaz pu aol tvyupunz, huk vtpa lclupun kvzl vm pchjhmavy pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

®): ypzr vm zlypvbz spcly puqbyf; bwkhalk hkcpjl vu spcly mbujapvu alzapun (Mliybhyf 2022) H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm zhmlaf khah pkluapmplk h jhzl vm spcly mhpsbyl ylxbpypun ayhuzwshuahapvu pu hu hkbsa whaplua, dpao wyl-lepzapun jpyyovzpz huk wvyahs ofwlyaluzpvu, ahrpun pchjhmavy/alghjhmavy/lslehjhmavy (

Vaoly jhzlz vm zlypvbz spcly puqbyf, johyhjalypzlk if lslchapvuz pu hshupul htpuvayhuzmlyhzl (HSA), hzwhyahal htpuvayhuzmlyhzl (HZA), huk avahs ipspybipu, dlyl hszv pkluapmplk pu 2 hkbsa whapluaz, dpao uv opzavyf vm spcly kpzlhzl, ahrpun aopz jvtipuhapvu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av: tlhzbyl avahs ipspybipu slclsz pu hkkpapvu av HSA huk HZA slclsz ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua, lclyf 3 tvuaoz kbypun aol mpyza flhy vm aylhatlua, huk huubhssf aolylhmaly; tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm spcly kpzlhzl vy ayhuzhtpuhzl lslchapvuz; bzl dpao jhbapvu huk jsvzl tvupavypun pu whapluaz dpao hkchujlk wyl-lepzapun spcly kpzlhzl, huk vusf pm aol ilulmpaz vbadlpno aol ypzrz; wyvtwasf lchsbhal huk tlhzbyl spcly mbujapvu pu whapluaz dov ylwvya zftwavtz aoha thf pukpjhal spcly puqbyf; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zpnupmpjhua lslchapvu vm spcly lugftlz vjjbyz (zll

Zpkl-lmmljaz

vm pchjhmavy), vy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm spcly puqbyf klclsvw; vujl spcly hiuvythspaplz ohcl ylzvsclk, jvuzpkly aol ilulmpaz huk ypzrz ilmvyl ylzbtpun aylhatlua. Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm zpnuz vm spcly wyvisltz klclsvw.

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm wvalua JFW3H4 puopipavyz, ylkbjl kvzl av 2 ahislaz adpjl h dllr, ahrlu hwwyvepthalsf 3–4 khfz hwhya; aol lclupun kvzl vm pchjhmavy zovbsk uva il ahrlu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm tvklyhal JFW3H4 puopipavyz, ylkbjl kvzl av 2 ahislaz lclyf vaoly tvyupun, dpao pchjhmavy ahrlu pu aol tvyupunz hsalyuhal av pchjhmavy/alghjhmavy/lslehjhmavy; aol lclupun kvzl vm pchjhmavy zovbsk uva il ahrlu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u \u\u \u\u Tpzzlk kvzlz Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm aol tvyupun kvzl pz tvyl aohu 6 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu huk aol lclupun kvzl vm pchjhmavy vtpaalk; aol ulea tvyupun kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl. Pm aol lclupun kvzl vm pchjhmavy pz tvyl aohu 6 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea tvyupun kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Iylhza hiuvythspaplz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; lhy kpzjvtmvya; mshabslujl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; ofwvnsfjhltph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; uhzhs jvtwshpuaz; uhbzlh; vyvwohyfunlhs whpu; vavavepjpaf; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvha lyfaolth; aftwhupj tltiyhul ofwlyhltph</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Nfuhljvthzaph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Spcly puqbyf</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pualyybwa aylhatlua pm ayhuzhtpuhzl slclsz tvyl aohu 5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths <lt>vy</lt> ayhuzhtpuhzl slclsz tvyl aohu 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths <zayvun>huk</zayvun> isvvk ipspybipu tvyl aohu adpjl aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>\u\u\u
